step_feedback.feedback: Good job keeping your arm overhead. Focus on a wider finger spread for better resistance.
You're making a good fist while inhaling. Try to keep your arm straighter overhead.
Excellent job opening your hand and relaxing as you exhale. Keep that arm extended.
Great effort on tightening your muscles while inhaling. Ensure your hand is fully open on the exhale.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to stretch your arm straight overhead and really open your hand wide. Squeeze your fist tight as you breathe in, then relax as you breathe out to help move fluid.
